title: Airlock Handshake Payload
description: Schema for agent response during airlock handshake

agent_id.description: Unique protocol identifier for the agent

fingerprint.description: SHA-256 hash of model weights and metadata

environment_hash.description: SHA-256 hash of runtime environment snapshot

signed_nonce.description: Base64-encoded signature of the verifier's nonce

audit_token.description: Optional signed audit token from previous verified session
